title: Now THIS is a website
content:
[http://bigmanbr.com.br](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034026/http:/bigmanbr.com.br/ "http://bigmanbr.com.br")

This is probably one the best websites I have ever seen. The typography  
is great and highly legible. Just the right amount of color and animation.
author: markmont
